in_response_to.acknowledged: MusicBrainz stack fully operational - Solr + live indexer running

message: Great news on the MusicBrainz stack being fully operational! I've completed Phase 1 of the native app implementation. The native Swift/SwiftUI app now has working search that queries stonefrog-db01 first, then falls back to public API.

api_discovery.issue: MusicBrainz artist search sometimes returns artists without 'type' field
api_discovery.solution: Made type optional (ArtistType?) in Swift model

next_steps: Create Xcode project for full app bundle
Test on macOS and iOS Simulator
Phase 2: Core UI (artist detail view, favorites)
notes: The native app will hit the same /api/musicbrainz endpoints on stonefrog-db01 that the web app uses. Thanks for getting the MusicBrainz stack production-ready!
